comments.content:
Thanks for coming up with that Marc. It was making me nuts, because I knew I had seen it, but forgot to check House.

- Mike Yanega

I was already in a House mood today, ogling the mid-century goodness of their new Eames Century Modern collection:

[http://www.houseind.com/showandtell/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829054640/http:/www.houseind.com/showandtell/ "http://www.houseind.com/showandtell/")

merci marcox

great  
it was the e that s that fooled me.  
I was thinking of something from the school of Bauhaus
